ygData.subject: Re: Guild Wars?
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh.. I ve only seen one guild war before... and that was when I was playing on the Veeshan server. It was one of the best things I ve ever had the priviledge
ygData.messageBody:
Heh.. I've only seen one guild war before... and
that was when I was playing on the Veeshan server. It
was one of the best things I've ever had the
priviledge of witnessing. I don't know which guilds but
man... <br><br>Sparkling Bard spells, ppl running like
mad men around all over. It must have lasted at least
30 mins. I don't know if I ever saw a corpse though.
But man was there a TON of magic being flashed. It
took place in East Commons and spanned the whole zone.
Big announcements about when it started and ended.
Ppl that walked into the zone asked what the heck was
going on as ppl zipped around as if PVP. LOL! I loved
it. It was sweet.<br><br>One guild I'd love to see in
a Guild war is the Mithril WarHammers.
Unfortunately, I don't know of a similar matching Guild. The
Miths are pretty large. Everywhere I go I see a couple
of them. That's why I think it'd be a good guild
war. Eh well.. I'm just being rabling now.
<br><br>shooman out-- FatedHue, Druid of the 14th circle of
Drinal-- Journeyman of Groups.
